dc_title_s: America Septentrionalis,: concinnata juxta observationes Dñn Academiæ Regalis Scientiarum et nonnullorum aliorum, et juxta annotationes recentissimas,; per G. de L'Isle, geographum. G.F. Lotter, sculps.
dc_description_s: Hand colored. Relief shown pictorially. Includes "Annotatio." 1 map: col.; 46 x 58 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Lotter, Georg Friedrich.,Lotter, Tobias Conrad, 1717-1777.,L'Isle, Guillaume de, 1675-1726.
